amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 105 of the bill which seeks to decrease the current supply of water to the Delta region.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-405 to remove provisions of the bill that seek to decrease the current supply of water to the Delta region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 247 (Roll no. 88).
